TopicTitle: Direct download KSP with steam expansions

Articles.Content: I bought KSP with direct download, I can buy the expansions in the steam and they will work with the direct download KSP

Welcome to the forums.

I'm pretty certain that it will work, yes.

I think it depends on steam. If steam will download the expansion to your computer, then the expansion should work. And steam considers the DLC to be an independent product, so it should download it.
